name: proshop
description: There are a lot of "eCommerce" courses out there, but most use some kind of prebuilt plugin or platform. In this course, we will build a completely customized eCommerce / shopping cart application from scratch with the MERN stack with the following functionality...  Full featured shopping cart  Product reviews and ratings  Top products carousel  Product pagination  Product search feature  User profile with orders  Admin product management  Admin user management  Admin Order details page  Mark orders as delivered option  Checkout process (shipping, payment method, etc)  PayPal / credit card integration  Custom database seeder script
